name: Raccoon Simulator 3D
description:
Role play a Raccoon :)

NEW CRAFT MISSIONS - Collect insects and bugs to craft new flowers and plants for the forest.

3D REAL SIMULATOR - You need to maintain your health, hunger, and energy to survive and protect yourself in the forest!

EPIC BATTLES - Run after, howl, and race to catch prey such wild bears, wolves, foxes, and rabbits! Fight off your enemies who do not want you to survive in this dangerous forest!

CREATE A RACCOON PACK - Create, unlock, and raise a pack of Raccoon to help you hunt and gather food, keep your strength up, and win battles against your enemies.

BE A REAL-LIFE RACCON - Gain experience points by trying to survive in this forest by searching for food, defeating your enemies, and attacking your prey!

GAIN A RACCOON PERSPECTIVE - Easy controls so you can live your life as a raccon! Zoom in and out to accomplish your raccoon missions! Hunt prey to gain energy and experience points!

This game features:
NEW CRAFT MISSIONS
3D REAL SIMULATOR
EPIC BATTLES
RACCOON PACKS
HUNTING WILD BEARS, WOLVES, FOXES, and RABBITS
COLLECTING DIFFERENT COLORED GEMS FOR ENERGY POINTS
AWESOME HIGH-DEFINITION GRAPHICS
ESCAPING FROM WILD PREDATORS OUT TO DESTROY YOU
STRUGGLING TO SURVIVE IN AN UNKNOWN FOREST
3D WORLD TO DISCOVER AND EXPLORE

Role play a REAL LIVE RACCOON!

Like us on Doodle Club!

Follow us on Chroma Club!

Icon Image Credit: "Raccoon Cute Pose" by N. McIntosh under Creative Commons 4.0 license/cropped from original

Music by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
